storm.asynchbase.bolt.mapper

Interface IAsyncHBaseFieldMapper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsyncHBaseFieldMapper

    public interface IAsyncHBaseFieldMapper
extends java.io.Serializable

    This interface configure an HBase RPC
    It maps tuple fields to part of the request and sets options
